title: ActivateAlarmInstance (Method)
text:
METHOD ActivateAlarmInstance : BOOL
The alarm can be deactivated by calling IAlarmHandler9.DeactivateAlarmInstance.
Returns TRUE if the operation was successful and the alarm was found.
This method uses semaphore synchronization with AlarmEvaluation_PRG.

rows.Name: pFBInstance
rows.Comment:
Pointer to the template FB instance. Use THIS when inside
the function block.

rows:
Alarm ID within the related alarm group template.
The alarm ID is inside the enum Alm_<Name of the alarm group template>_Alarm_IDs
